Title: Establishes certain statewide literacy education programs
Summary: Establishes certain statewide literacy education programs including standards for an early education program, statewide parents as teachers program, a reading program to provide direct support for and intervention in intensive reading intervention services, and the district reading intervention program.
LawCode: Amd ยง305, add ยง818, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to establishing certain statewide literacy education programs
